name: Pesce alla besciamella delizioso
desc: A fish dish served in sauce. The translucent fillet lies upon exquisite cream sauce. With only a small mouthful, one might even see fish leaping on the sea surface.

customize.name: Ricetta: pesce alla besciamella
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Fish With Cream Sauce.

customize.name: Pesce
customize.desc: Un filetto di pesce fresco. Se trattato in modo appropriato, può diventare un piatto prelibato.

customize.name: Latte
customize.desc: Latte di mucca dolce e aromatico. Non sprecarne neanche una goccia, neanche quella rimasta sulle tue labbra.

customize.name: Menta
customize.desc: Un ingrediente rinfrescante che può mitigare la piccantezza di molti piatti.

customize.name: Pesce alla besciamella
customize.desc: A fish dish served in sauce. Fresh fish filets were dried before pan-fried until crispy, then drizzled with a creamy white dressing and sprinkled with fresh mint. A unique dish that can be made through the simplest methods.

customize.name: Pesce alla besciamella sospetto
customize.desc: A fish dish served in sauce. The outside was burnt in searing hot oil. It is rather hard not to notice the sharp contrast between the charcoal-black fish and the milk-white sauce. Only the meat inside seems edible… Wait, what's with this sourness?

value.text: Restores 22% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 470 HP every 5s for 30s.
